ygData.subject: Re: Research on bard stats
ygData.msgSnippet: i am all for it, i just keep forgetting to check before i log out!  i will try again to remember tonight. Shada Silverleaf, Level 45 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
ygData.messageBody:
i am all for it, i just keep forgetting to check before i log out! i will
try again to remember tonight.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 45 Bard, Mithaniel Marr


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Reece, Tom CPT - 30th Signal Bn
> [mailto:ReeceT@...]
> Sent: Monday, June 14, 1999 2:12 PM
> To: EQBards
> Subject: [eqbards] Research on bard stats
>
>
> From: "Reece, Tom CPT - 30th Signal Bn" <ReeceT@...>
>
> Last week I sent out a request to everyone on the list to send me
> information on their bard character. I requested everyone
> send me a list of
> their primary stats so I could determine what the average
> stats were for
> bard characters. Also need to know what your race is so I
> can differentiate
> the average stats between the three races. So far the number
> of responses I
> have received has been less than encouraging.
>
> Unless a majority of you are opposed to using this forum for
> this type of
> research, I will continue to periodically post this request
> until I get
> enough responses to generate some valid results. If you are
> opposed to me
> using this list for this type of research, send me a private
> email. Also,
> if you send me your character's stats, be sure to send them
> via private
> email as well.
>
> Galtin
> E'ci
>
> --------------------------------------------------------------
> ----------
> Where do some of the Internet's largest email lists reside?
> http://www.onelist.com
> At ONElist - the most scalable and reliable service on the Internet.
>
